name: indent
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

dsense.name: indent
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to make a space at the edge or on the surface of something
trans_examp.trans_cn: 在…边沿（或表面）留出空间

example.eg: Each new paragraph should be indented about two centimetres from the margin.
example.egtrans: 每新起一段都应缩进约两厘米书写。

dsense.name: indent
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to make an official request for goods

example.eg: We indented for the engine spares last month.
example.egtrans: 我们上个月订购了发动机零件。

name: indent
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: indent
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a space at the edge or on the surface of something
trans_examp.trans_cn: 在…边沿（或表面）留出的空间

dsense.name: indent
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

example.eg: We made an indent for the engine spares last week.
example.egtrans: 我们上周订购了发动机零件。
